Over the Summer we’ve introduced a wave of new features and devices designed to make gaming more seamless, personalized, and rewarding – whether you’re at home, on the go, or diving into cloud play. As we move into the Fall, we continue our quest to add improved innovation for our players.

First up, the **ROG Xbox Ally** and **ROG Xbox Ally X**, portable gaming handhelds that deliver premium gaming performance for PC gaming, are now available to purchase. We also launched the **Handheld Compatibility Program**, making it easier to identify which games are optimized for handheld play.

On PC, we’ve improved **download speeds** and optimized bandwidth usage, making it easier to jump into your games faster and with fewer slowdowns. Game Hubs have been updated on Xbox consoles with new modules that surface **Official Club** news and **Game Pass benefits**, so players can stay plugged into publisher updates and unlock more value from their subscriptions.

And in case you missed it, new *The Outer Worlds 2* controllers are available and Xbox Series X|S consoles have new dynamic backgrounds. Read about these and much more below.

## **Here’s What’s New**

**ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X – Available Now**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/VisID_Main_16x9-TIFA-93ec59507f1f276c9bef-1900x1080.jpg)

Experience seamless PC gaming on the go with the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. Whether you’re all-in on performance or just want to jump into the action, the new ROG Xbox Ally handhelds have you covered. The ROG Xbox Ally delivers a smooth PC gaming experience for casual players and enthusiasts alike, while ROG Xbox Ally X is built for those who demand top-tier performance. On both devices, you can get help, insights, and recommendations from Gaming Copilot with the press of a button. These handhelds deliver everything you need to play your way – [grab yours now!](https://www.xbox.com/handhelds/rog-xbox-ally)

**Handheld Compatibility Program – Helping Players Play Smarter**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/Wire-Post-Oct-Zoomed-d2959d369e016b3f820b-1900x1080.jpg)

We’ve introduced the new [Handheld Compatibility Program](https://www.xbox.com/handhelds/handheld-compatibility) to make it easier for you to identify which games are optimized for handheld play. This update is now visible on product detail pages across all Windows devices and featured in the handheld compatible channel on Home on supported Windows handhelds.

To support informed choices, a compatibility notification will appear before installation or purchase if a game is not currently Handheld Optimized, helping you understand how a game will play on handheld. [Back to Top]

## **PC Gaming Updates**

**Faster Downloads, Sharper Experience**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/Mockup-4dbe022e3251a1813b95-1900x1080.jpg)

We’ve rolled out updates to the Xbox PC app that improve download speeds so you can jump into your games faster. These changes are available now.

We’ve made improvements to the download tool, allowing the app to better optimize your PC’s internet connection. That means fewer slowdowns and smarter bandwidth usage, especially on high-speed networks.

This is part of our ongoing commitment to making Xbox on PC faster, more responsive, and tuned to player feedback. We’ll continue listening to feedback and monitoring performance as the rollout expands. [Back to Top]

## **Xbox Console Updates**

**Official Clubs and Game Pass Benefits Update**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/FY26_OverwatchBenefitsWirePost-1920x1080-V2-c14133b2a3c79d0959ca-1900x1080.jpg)

Stay plugged into publisher updates and unlock more value with Game Pass. Game Hubs now include two new modules designed to keep you informed and engaged. The first provides the latest news from Official Clubs (where available), while the second highlights any Game Pass in-game benefits tied to the title. These updates have started to roll out and will soon appear alongside existing modules like **Your game stats** and **Available add-ons**, making it easier than ever for you to discover what’s new and take advantage of what’s included. [Back to Top]

## **In Case You Missed It**

**Xbox Accessories – *The Outer Worlds 2* Xbox Wireless Controller and Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/XDL_16x9_SNIPE-3c098c56fe7386bde033-1900x1080.jpg)

Step into the sequel with gear that’s ready for the mission. *The Outer Worlds 2* Xbox Wireless Controller and Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2 bring bold new designs inspired by The Moon Man and the galactic rifts threatening humanity’s survival. These aren’t just controllers; they’re your ultimate weapon in the Arcadia system. Available now through [Xbox Design Lab](https://www.xbox.com/accessories/controllers/the-outer-worlds-2-xbox-controllers), both options let players gear up with style and purpose.

**Xbox Console – Dynamic Backgrounds**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/TOW2_Xbox-Dynamic-BG_Newsletter_1920x1080-3974355696323993cfe4-1900x1080.jpg)

*Battlefield 6, Keeper, The Elder Scrolls Online,* and *The Outer Worlds 2* all introduced new dynamic backgrounds for Xbox Series X|S consoles, allowing you to customize your console and celebrate these exciting new games. [Back to Top]

**Xbox adds mouse and keyboard and touch controls for more games**

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/10/touch-controls-keeper-dbb11b2cb3e22ed6d1bf-1900x1080.jpg)

Xbox supports the use of wired USB [mice and keyboards](https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2024/05/15/xbox-may-update-2024/) for navigation in select games and apps, as well as across Xbox and Windows devices.

For players enjoying Xbox games on mobile, Xbox [touch controls](https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2024/02/14/xbox-february-update-rolls-out-2024/) deliver a controller-free experience for hundreds of titles. Today, there are 130+ games with mouse and keyboard support active on cloud and 230+ games with touch controls available on cloud, giving you more ways to play than ever before.

Some games even provide custom control overlays or render their own touch layouts, creating a tailored experience for each title’s unique gameplay. Learn how to set up and customize your touch controls [here](https://support.xbox.com/en-US/help/games-apps/cloud-gaming/use-touch-controls). [Back to Top]
